recipes.title: Whole Wheat Bread Sandwich
recipes.description: The Perfect Way to Start Your Day
steps: Heat the oil and saute all the vegetables.
After sauting, put some salt and chilli powder. Cook for 15 mins
Take two slices of bread and transfer veggies between the bread.
Smear the Butter and Toast on both sides.
Enjoy your Breakfast!!!

recipes.title: Bengal Gram Salad
steps: Soak Chana Overnight
Boil soaked chana in salted water
In a bowl, add boiled chana, chopped tomatoes, chopped cucumber, chilli powder, salt, chopped corianders
Add Lemon juice to it.
Enjoy your Salad!!!

recipes.title: Almond Kheer
steps: Soak the Almonds nearly 4-5 Hours.
Peel the skin of almonds
Blender almonds,cardomons,saffron together as a paste.
Boil the milk and add the paste to it.
Enjoy your Kheer!!!

recipes.title: Carrot Juice
steps: Rinse the carrots very well in water and drain them naturally.
Chop carrots into small cubes
Blend the carrot well with mixing of required water.
Add sugar if you want.
Enjoy your Juice!!!
